backend/main.mo: Actor defining numerous device- and research-related types while including storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend files and their recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, routes, theme provider, and global toaster inside the main app component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/GameLayou: Layout wrapper with navigation, page container, and conditional profile‑setup modal display.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Reusable page header showing an icon, title, subtitle, and optional action elements.
frontend/src/components/nav/MainNav.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with desktop and mobile support, showing company branding, nav links, and user login state.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileNavPan: Provides a slide-in mobile navigation panel listing routes and highlighting the active path.
frontend/src/features/branding/LogoCreat: Interactive form for generating and customizing SVG logos based on text, shape, and colors.
frontend/src/features/branding/logoFallb: Generates fallback SVG logos using initials when no custom logo is provided.
frontend/src/features/branding/logoGener: Creates SVG logos with configurable shapes, gradients, and initials; provides defaults and helper utilities.
frontend/src/features/branding/LogoRende: Displays a provided SVG logo or falls back to an auto-generated initials-based SVG.
frontend/src/features/cloud-saves/SaveSl: Manages save slots allowing creation, loading, and renaming of game saves with dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/features/competitors/Compet: Displays a grid of competitor cards showing stats like cash, market share, products, and strength.
frontend/src/features/competitors/compet: Zustand store defining competitor data, initialization based on difficulty, and update helpers.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/bestProd: Provides functions to filter products, calculate scores, determine best products, and list available release years.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/BestProd: Displays yearly best products by category, allowing year selection and showing top-scoring winners with logos and scores.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/MetricsP: Shows static business metrics in a grid with trend indicators and a progress bar for R&D.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/released: Creates released product records, extracts category and features, and retrieves product logos based on blueprint metadata.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Blue: Lists all device blueprints with key specs and category badges, allowing editing and product release actions.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/desi: Defines available design options per device category with names, styles, and icons.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Desi: Shows available designs for a device category and lets users select one with visual previews.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/devi: Defines a factory function that returns a fully populated default DeviceBlueprint object with preset hardware and connection fields.
frontend/src/features/device-studio/Devi: Form for creating or editing device blueprints with foldable and premium feature handling.
frontend/src/features/investments/Invest: UI panel for performing investments and building stores, handling cash validation, state updates, and triggering toast notifications.
Displays a scrollable history of past investments with icons, amounts, descriptions, and timestamps.
frontend/src/features/investments/invest: Zustand store managing an investment list with persistence and a method to append new investment entries.
Renders a scrollable feed of market events with icons, badges, descriptions, and formatted day labels.
frontend/src/features/market/marketFeedS: Zustand store for market events, allowing new events to be added and storing up to 100 entries.
frontend/src/features/new-game/difficult: Defines difficulty presets specifying starting cash and gameplay modifiers for normal and challenging modes.
frontend/src/features/new-game/NewGameMo: Modal for starting a new game, collecting company info, choosing difficulty, and initializing game state.
frontend/src/features/office/Office3DVie: 3D office viewer using react-three-fiber, rendering an animated office scene based on level presets and decor.
frontend/src/features/office/officeAnima: Provides small animation helper functions for flicker, light pulsing, and plant sway.
frontend/src/features/office/officeArchi: Renders the 3D office room shell with walls, floor, window, and door materials based on decor settings.
frontend/src/features/office/officeDecor: Defines types and lists of available wall colors, wallpaper patterns, and wood floor styles with defaults.
frontend/src/features/office/OfficeDecor: UI panel for selecting wall finishes, wallpaper patterns, and floor styles using the office store.
frontend/src/features/office/officeDecor: Generates procedural wallpaper and wood floor textures using canvas for Three.js materials.
frontend/src/features/office/officeMater: Defines material presets, lighting and color palettes by level, and creates wall and floor materials.
frontend/src/features/office/officeProps: Defines React components rendering 3D desk, chair, and monitor models with customizable styles and positions.
frontend/src/features/office/officeScene: Provides preset office layouts for different level ranges, specifying floor sizes and prop placements.
frontend/src/features/office/officeStore: Implements a persistent Zustand store managing office level, upgrade cost, and decor settings with update functions.
frontend/src/features/office/OfficeUpgra: Displays office level, bonuses, upgrade cost, and handles upgrade actions with validation.
frontend/src/features/products/releaseMo: Contains utility functions applying productivity and attraction bonuses to production cost, sales, and rating.
frontend/src/features/products/ReleasePr: Renders a modal for releasing a product, handling pricing, cost calculations, validation, and product creation.
frontend/src/features/research/ResearchD: Displays detailed info about a research item and handles starting research with cost and prerequisite checks.
frontend/src/features/research/ResearchL: Lists research technologies with search and category filtering and opens a detail panel for selected items.
frontend/src/features/research/techDatas: Generates a dataset of 3000 technology research items with categories, effects, pricing, and requirements.
frontend/src/features/simulation/eraEven: Defines historical era events with dates and gameplay effects, providing a static chronological dataset.
frontend/src/features/simulation/simulat: Runs the day‑to‑day simulation loop, triggering era events, competitor actions, and updating game state.
frontend/src/features/stores/storeNetwor: Defines store network constants and logic for bonuses, validation, and creating store entities.
Zustand store managing store network state, including building stores and persistence.
frontend/src/features/stores/StoreNetwor: UI panel showing store network totals, bonuses, and locations.
frontend/src/features/stores/StoresBuild: UI card allowing players to select a country and build a new store with displayed costs and bonuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data through an actor, covering user profiles, device data, technologies, research, and premium unlocks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CloudSavesPage.tsx: Renders the cloud saves page, showing login prompts when unauthenticated or save slots when signed in.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitorsMarketPage: Displays competitor and market feed tabs with a shared page header.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the main dashboard with simulation controls, metrics, product stats, and company branding.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceStudioPage.tsx: Provides tabs for editing device blueprints and viewing the blueprint list, with selection state management.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentsPage.tsx: Displays investment actions, store network summary, and an investments log.
frontend/src/pages/OfficePage.tsx: Shows office management panels for upgrades, decor, and a 3D office viewer.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPage.tsx: Renders the research page with a header and a list of research items.
frontend/src/state/gameState.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand store holding game state, released products, branding, and event tracking with mutation helpers.
frontend/src/state/saveGameStore.ts: Zustand store defining current save ID and local store network with persistence and reset helpers.
frontend/src/utils/gameCalendar.ts: Utility for converting simulation days to Gregorian dates with leap-year logic and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, layout, and enabling plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versions, game scope, architecture notes, and existing implemented features.
